questions:

B) Daily life and people

D) Architecture and sports

B) At a beach
C) Outside a stadium
D) Inside a museum

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A quiet street scene
D) A family gathering

B) An animal
C) A building
D) A vehicle

B) A road
C) A stadium
